column2: Active, groomed, but very large tumors on neck and back of head.  Sac'd due to tumor burden.  Mulitple spherical tumors present.
DCT-TVA; Braf CA; ink/arf f/f; pten f/f
Brain, lungs, heart, liver, kidneys, spleen, tumor
None of the ~4 tumors were ulcerating, all were solid.  Skull was intact.  Large lung met obvious upon gross inspection (~3mm in diameter).
Cell line attempted, 2 tumor chucks cryopreserved.
